transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello sir, namaskaram sir.
Customer: Aa para para. Kishan aanu India martinnu?
Executive: Aa para para para. Sir nammude manager avide linil undayirunnu. Head office enikku avanethire njan ippo case ithu kodukkanulla paripaadi kond njan ippo cheyyan pokunnu. Jelil koodi edukkan pokunnu.
Executive: Enthuvaanu sir?
Customer: Avanethireyulla case njan ippo India martinnu ulppade ullavarkku angottu kodukkan pokuva.
Executive: Enthu enna vishayam? Ningalude boss ningalude boss ulppade ennu ariyatte. Ingane ullavanaano ee customer carel niruthi irikkunnathu?
Customer: En en ennanu sir issue enthanu? Enthu vishayam?
Executive: Athu ariyatte. Balakrishnan ennalle avante peru paranjathu?
Customer: Athu ariyatte.
Customer: Ingane ulla ingane ulla poomarayano ingane ulla oru paripaadikku vechirikkunnathu?
Executive: Alla sir ningalude communication engene poyennu enikku ariyathilla. Athukonda njan just chodhichathu.
Customer: Communication mosamaayathukondalle njan aadhyame paranjathu. Enikku venda nee vilikkenda ennu paranjathu. Pakshe avan thudare vilichondirikkukaya.
Customer: Athu parayunnathu innu entha ningalkku edukkaan vayyaathe? Naale entha edukkaan vayyaathe? Ivante ishtaprakaramaano njan edukendathu? Njan anusarichu cheyyendathu?
Executive: Okay okay. Alla sir ennanu vechu kazhinjaal undallo ee kazhinja praavashyam october month aayathukond nammude festival bonanza ennu paranjoru offer India mart provide cheythayirunnu. So athilu nammude enikku january vare time undu.
Customer: Undu undu undu. Ente january vareyaanu ente renewal time. Athinu munbu enne enne ang haras cheyyunnathu maathiri. Enthukond ippo cheyyan pattathilla? Ippo enthukond payment cheyyan pattilla? Vilikkunnathokke oru oru avan ishtamulla timeil.
Customer: Njan ingane paranjathu thigalaazhcha ennu paranjathu raavile 10 mani aavumbo vilikkan paranjathu. Aa 10 mani timeil njan busy aayirunnu. Okay njan paranjathu njan kurachu kazhinju njan oru customer eduthayirunnu. Appo njan pinne vilikkaam. Aalkku nee parayunnathu nee parayunnathu kondu enne thirichu ingottu ente aduthu. Njan paranjathu enikku ippo samayamilla.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Ithinu munbu kure praavashyam ente time njan paranjathu nee vilikkukayaanenkil athu raavile 10 mani aavumbo vilikku. Appo nammal mind set cheythu nammal aa ithil irikkum. Oru uchayokke aavumbo thanne pala customers aayirikkum vilikkunnathu. Appo athinte thalavedana okke kondu nammal aake ithaayittirikkunna samayathu aanenkil ivan ivante features parayaan vilikkunnathu.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Sariyaanu saar ente situation manassilaayi manassilaayirunnu.
Customer: Pakshe saar njan oru kaaryam parayaam saar saarinu january maasam vare samayamundu so nerathe cheyyumbothekkum athinulla benifit saarinu nammude profileil.
Executive: Okay anyway enthaayaalum ningalude chairman ulppade ullavarkku njan ithu ayakkukayaanu. Ayachu avar decide cheyyatte. Ingane balakrishnan ennu parayumbo enthaayaalum south indian aanu.
Executive: Illa illa idheham north delhiyil ulla vyakthiyaanu.
Customer: North onnumalla north onnumalla namukku ariyaavallo balakrishnan ennu parayunnathu balakrishna enthaanu perennullathu namukkum pattunna vishayam nammalum kure varshamaayi ithilokke undaayirunnu northil undaayirunnu.
Executive: Athe saar athe saar adhehath adheham bangalorilaanu adhehathinte family ullathu pakshe settled thanne delhi aanu saar.
Customer: Nokatte avar avar srehikkette ingane ullavare ithu cheyyano vendallo ennulla. Njan voice ulppade ayakkan pokunnu.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Iwan vilicha phoninde njan paranjathu ellam record cheythittullathaanu mobileil ente recording ullathaanu. Appo engene samsaarikkanam ennulathu aa reethiyil venamennokke njan paranjukoduthathaa.
Executive: Okay kelkkunnille pinne sthiramaayittu ingane ulla oru harassment tunil ulla varthaanamaanenkil.
Customer: Ariyatte.
Executive: Manassilaayi saar saar ippo athu aa oru call harassment aayippoyi ennulla kaaryam enikku ariyathillaayirunnu. I am very sorry for that saar actually ithaayirunnu enikku ippo adheham ippo linil enne vilikkan paranjayirunnu saarine.
Customer: Enthinu vilikku saare?
Executive: Njan alle marannille athukonda paranjathu ningalude muthalaalimaar ariyittu oru oru oru ningalude staff aa oru customer aduthu enganeyaanu samsaarikkunna reethi ennullathokke onnu ariyatte.
Executive: Okay manassilaayi saar manassilaayi saar.
Executive: Saare athu saarinte athayathu paranjolu saar paranjolu paranjolu paranjolu.
Customer: Alla alla ithippo saarine ippo january maasam vare samayamundu so ee praavashyam cheyyanam ennu paranjulla oru ithaayirunno aa callil sambhavichirunnathu?
Executive: Yes athanne.
Executive: Okay alla kuzhappamilla saarine ippo january maasam cheyyukayaanenkilum kuzhappamilla january maasam enthaanenkilum oru 30 days bifore saar process cheyyukayaanenkil kurachumkoodi better aayirikkum namukku second yearil pokumbo catalogue remappingum pinne google based aayittulla oru algorithmthil ulla oru catalogue nammal ready aakkunnundu second yearilottu pokunnavarkku.
Executive: So athu nokkumbothekkine saarine add cheythirikkunna ezh product promote aayittundu. So ezh product promote aayi baakkiyulla productum koodi aa oru levellilekkulla oru promotion kittaam vendiyittulla oru algorithm base cheythittulla oru catalogue aanu second yearil nammal provide cheyyunnathu. Pinne last time nammal discuss cheytha pole second year varunnathu enikku ippo njaan ippo edukkaan thudangittanne moonnaaru kollam aayille?
Executive: Athe athe pakshe ippo njan nokkiyappothekkine ithu ee idakku gap polum ittaayirunnu saar.
Customer: Continuity base cheythilaano vannathu?
Executive: Alla alla alla alla renewal nde ithupole oru undaayi ente payment.
Customer: Idakku gap ittaayirunnallo okay covid timeil ningalude ithupole oru staff vilichittu thudare vilichu njan payment koduthu.
Executive: Okay saar okay.
Customer: Payment koduthittu pinne athu lockdown allam aayille?
Executive: Athe athe.
Customer: Lockdown kondu nammal service upayogikkunnundaayirunnu?
Executive: Upayogikkunnillaayirunnu okay.
Customer: Ella sarkaar officukalum ellaam ullathum athile oru adjustment cheyyukaayirunnu.
Executive: Exactly saar okay.
Customer: Pinnappo renewal nde time aayi njan paranjathu enikku venda ningalude service venda. Ippo covid njan ente jeevan kondu pokaan nokkunno atho business nadathaan pokunno?
Executive: Athu sheriyaanu sheriyaanu appo njan athaa nokkiyathu nammude profileil oru cheriyoru gap vannittundaayirunnu in between ee gapil so appo nammal aa oru weightage continue aayirunnenkil saar ippo promotion listingil thanne topil vannene. Ithrayum weightage ulla nammude profile aa athaa athukonda njan paranjathu oru oru oru aadikkoru sambhavangal parayumbo detailed aayittu parayanam alla ee kallam paranjittu enthengilum business reethiyil aakkaan nokkiyenne nammalum ee business cheyyunna vyakthikal alle namukku eluppamennu manassilaakkaan pattum. Ivano ivar ang valiya smart aanennulla reethiyila pakshe oro tunilum namukkum ithu manassilaavathille catch aavathille?
Customer: Athe athe athe. Appo athu njan paranjullu.
Executive: Okay appo athe ennodu chodhichaayirunnu namukku google meet enthengilum connect cheythaayirunnu ennu appo njan paranjathu nammal avasaanamaayittu njan ente saarinte profile ente kayyil undaayirunna samayathu avasaanam njan saarine connect cheythappo saar annu chainayil aayirunnu so naattil vannittu connect cheyyaam ennaanu saar paranjathu pinne athil pinne proper aayittu nammale kondu samsaarikkan pattiilla google meetil.
Customer: Appo athe varukayaanenkil kurachumkoodi enthaa paraya screen present cheythu saarine aayikotte appo enthaayaalum ille njan ithonnu letter onnu craft cheyyatte ee voice ellam onnu avarkkonnu ariyippikkatte.
Executive: Avaru kelkgo ennu polum ariyathilla saar.
Customer: Eathu?
Executive: Alla saar ippo matte chairman okke alle nammal loop cheyyunnathu nammude mailil.
Customer: Aa nokatte illenkil social media ille exil oronnu post cheyyum.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Nerathe cheytha pole exil oronnu post cheyyum ningalude muthalaalimaarum kaanumo illayo ennathu nokkaam.
Executive: Sheri saar manassilaayi saar manassilaayi saar.
Customer: Ithunnum nerathe ithupole onnu vannayirunnallo athe athe ningalude saar vannu saarum njaanumaayi samsaarichathaa ningalude bosumaayi njan samsaarichathaa.
Executive: Oh okay md saarumaayi samsaarichayirunno?
Customer: Aa okay okay. Athukondalle ithra dhairyamaayittu nammal ayakkan thudangunathu thanne athukondalle okay kittiyillenkil thirichu exil naale aalu kaanatte.
Executive: Sheri saar exil okay okay.
Customer: Public kaanunnathu kazhiyumbol pullikkum manassilaavumallo issue ullu aayittulla.
Executive: Athe athe actually voice oru naalu praavashyathe voice njan angottu ithu clip cheythittu athukoodi idum annere ariyaam india martinnu enthaa aannullathu standard.
Customer: Namalude aduthu kali varumbo nammal thirichu kaanikkathille bhaai sheriyaanu saar.
Customer: Appo athu enikku ariyaavunnathukondu thanne njaan cheyyunnu.
Executive: Manassilaayi saar manassilaayi saar.
Customer: Okay so appo njan adhehathodu paranjolaam adheham ippo ennodu call cheyyaana paranjathu.
Executive: Enthinu?
Customer: Athukonda njan saarine vilichathu.
Customer: Aa venda venda venda venda ithini avar baakkiyullavar theerumaanikkate njaanumaayi ivan samsaarikkanno venda ennullathu.
Executive: Sheri saar sheri saar.
Customer: Okay okay okay saar okay appo enthengilum undenkil saar vilikkuka.
Executive: Saare ethaa ethaa?
Executive: Alla enthengilum undenkil saar enne vilikkuka.
Customer: Aa aayikotte vilikkaam okay saar okay thank you saar.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received harassing calls from IndiaMART employee.

- Wants action against the employee.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with IndiaMART's communication.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the harassment.

- Assured the customer that the issue will be addressed.

- Explained about the benefits of renewing the subscription.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a letter with voice recordings.

- IndiaMART will decide on further action.



Alert (If Any):

harassment

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- harassment, subscription, renewal, communication
